event.description: Captain, it looks like some sauronids snuck into the ship on our last stop, and are now nesting in one of the coolant pods. What should we do?

option.description: Jettison the coolant pod.
option.result: The crew detaches the coolant pod. It glides into the cold eternity of space.

option.description: Vent some fuel into the coolant bay.
option.result: The fuel is toxic to the sauronids. They all die a hideous death.

option.description: Organize a crew to hunt them down.
option.result: The hunting party is a great success. Only one crew member is lost.

event.description: Captain, a Cylorean marauder ship has appeared out of nowhere. They are known for their cruel and unusual ways.

option.description: Send some crew members as tribute.
option.result: The Cyloreans are well pleased with their new toys.

option.description: Blow them out of the sky!
option.result: The marauders put up quite a fight!

option.description: Engineering, overload the engines and get us out of here!
option.result: The engines wail under the stress, but you escape.

event.description: RED SHIRT: Captain, I'm stuck on this planet and the natives seem restless. Requesting immediate evacuation!

option.description: It has been an honor serving with you. Lieutenant, take us out of here.
option.result: It is a sad day, but RED SHIRT will be remembered.

option.description: Commence orbital bombardment.
option.result: The planet takes on a nice shade of grey.

option.description: Send a shuttle to fetch the poor bastard.
option.result: RED SHIRT is relieved. He lives to die another day.

event.description: Captain, we have encountered a dense asteroid field. Should we detour?

option.description: Push through! We have no time to waste.
option.result: Some minor objects smash into the ship.

option.description: Try to avoid the worst of it, but maintain the course.
option.result: 'Tis but a scratch.

option.description: Keep a wide berth. We can't risk the ship now.
option.result: Better safe than sorry!

event.description: Captain, some peaceful Kolnari traders are pinging us.

option.description: Buy some fuel with crew.
option.result: The dismayed look in their eyes disturbs you... but fuel is fuel.

option.description: Buy some replacement parts with crew.
option.result: Sometimes you have to take one for the team.

option.description: Ignore them.
option.result: The traders resent your impolite manner.

option.description: Just take their wares by force. Who travels without weapons?
option.result: Free fuel and parts!

event.description: Captain, flu has broken out among the crew!

option.description: Who cares? The officers are immunized.
option.result: You brush the casualty report away while enjoying your afternoon tea.

option.description: Detour to buy aid from the nearest hospital.
option.result: The automated hospital replaces the defective crew members for a minor cost.

option.description: Flush the infected ones through the airlock to protect the rest.
option.result: Quite a lot of air was lost, but some losses must be accepted.

event.description: Captain, the science officer reports that one of our plants has gained sentience.

option.description: Jettison it immediately!
option.result: The plant spins off to the stars, quite pleased.

option.description: Make a special effort to water and nurture the plant.
option.result: It grows, becoming an above-average crew member.

event.description: Captain, a scout vessel of the Mandrusian empire has been detected!

option.description: Fire a warning shot.
option.result: The scout ship skips away, engines hot.

option.description: Destroy it.
option.result: The scout ship is torn apart by a barrage of energy beams. How satisfying.

option.description: Capture the crew.
option.result: After a speedy chase and short negotiations, the crew is willing to join you.

event.description: Captain, it seems that we have encountered a small black hole. How exciting!

option.description: Make a daring pass along the edge to capture some fuel.
option.result: The radiation is bad for both crew and ship, but you did catch a lot of fuel.

option.description: Dump the ship's waste into the black hole.
option.result: How convenient and ecological!

event.description: Captain, we will soon pass the pleasure world Humphrey III. Perhaps some shore leave?

option.description: I could do with some relaxation. Approved!
option.result: After the brief stop, the tally shows additional crew members. No one can explain.

option.description: Absolutely not!
option.result: The crew seems disappointed, but such is life aboard a space ship.

option.description: Mutiny! Flush this fool through the airlock!
option.result: The young ensign learned his lesson. Discipline is much improved.

event.description: Captain, a lovely Kashman dignitary wishes to hitch a ride to Earth.

option.description: Bring her aboard, the more the merrier!
option.result: The crew is badly distracted by the dignitary, resulting in accidents.

option.description: No.
option.result: You find yourself unable to resist her attentions. How curious.

event.description: Captain, the chief engineer has turned into a newt!

option.description: He'll get better.
option.result: He got better.

option.description: Assign him to therapy.
option.result: The sessions are filmed and gain a cult following across the galaxy.

option.description: We have a no pet policy on this ship.
option.result: The chief engineer becomes the first newt to be flushed into space.

event.description: Captain! ... Sorry, I just wanted to hear myself say your rank.

option.description: Carry on.
option.result: Yes, sir!

option.description: So did I.
option.result: An awkward silence ensues. This subject is never mentioned again.

event.description: Captain, the crew seems to be arguing over whether Pokemon Blue or Red was better.

option.description: They are all quite mistaken. In fact, Pokemen Yellow...
option.result: The argument erupts in violence. Luckily no one is killed.

option.description: We will determine this with a Pokemon tournament between the factions.
option.result: The required devices are fabricated, and ritual combat is successfully concluded.

option.description: Hah, those games are for children! Speaking of it will be considered mutiny.
option.result: With grudging silence, the captain's quarters are vandalized in protest.

event.description: Captain, a very peculiar beacon is emitting a weak signal nearby. Possibly alien.

option.description: Send a probe to investigate.
option.result: The probe is unable to locate the beacon for some reason.

option.description: Send a shuttle to investigate.
option.result: Richard Redshirt is killed, but salvaging the beacon fortunately yields some fuel.

option.description: Ignore it. We have better things to do than study ancient alien garbage.
